Thrombocytopenia Immune:[[3458], [50943], [7454], [3592], [3558], [3106], [7124], [1493], [6774], [3123], [59067], [2213], [3586], [3605], [7040], [3146], [5133], [3565], [51284], [6714], [84868], [29126], [3606], [3553], [1401], [3456], [3717], [2064], [3091], [3105], [7421], [942], [6347], [864], [8809], [2212], [3383], [355], [3845], [90865], [282617], [114548], [3690], [3439], [4352], [2908], [3620], [4153], [5970], [8743], [3662], [3557], [2214], [3627], [26191], [4049], [30835], [6352], [23586], [51561], [406947], [3665], [10673], [5196], [7015], [4026], [3075], [959], [149233], [406938], [6772], [5243], [861], [7450], [3566], [11093], [112744], [5054], [4780], [3689], [246778], [3552], [7189], [1803], [9021], [3815], [811], [1269], [50616], [2335], [2215], [1524], [948], [8878], [282618], [3674], [9429], [4869], [3002], [6737], [841], [2322], [8829], [648], [30009], [6402], [3125], [2533], [3903], [1789], [998], [5293], [947], [8741], [867], [5156], [4854], [7066], [3683], [943], [3578], [3685], [6786], [1050], [3673], [3603], [1788], [102], [8856], [2149], [2161], [350], [2624], [9817], [26762], [58191], [23495], [54790], [970], [3126], [7293], [3589], [10148], [87], [58484], [1356], [3426], [6773], [60674], [406958], [2220], [52], [10507], [115650], [4758], [282616], [6580], [406959], [3001], [7307], [5795], [574447], [1633], [80739], [10068], [51185], [8932], [407055], [8930], [11026], [8876], [171389], [8328], [574413], [971], [192343]]
